name: Feature1
title: Energy Storage Challenges
desc: The intermittency of solar energy production requires effective energy storage solutions for continuous power supply.

name: Feature2
title: Carbon Footprint Of Manufacturing
desc: The manufacturing process of solar panels, particularly if reliant on fossil fuels, can contribute to carbon emissions.

name: Feature3
title: Limited Energy Conversion Efficiency
desc: The efficiency of solar panels in converting sunlight to electricity is not 100%, leading to some energy loss.

name: Feature3
title: Land Use and Ecosystem Impact
desc: Large-scale solar projects can impact local ecosystems and biodiversity by requiring significant land use.
